fields.name: Strong Carrier
fields.description: The bag is always too small for you. +30kg carry weight

fields.name: Chef Recommended
fields.description: You have a talent in cooking. You get 20% more benefit from food

fields.name: Fast Sleeper
fields.description: 1 Mississippi 2 Mississippi 3 Mississzzzzzzzz... You recover 20% faster from sleep

fields.name: Cruel Bargainer
fields.description: You always can take advantages from buy and sale. You gain 10% coins from selling stuff.

fields.name: Hacker
fields.description: Hack into the National Food Storage System? 1, 2, 3, and done! You gain 20% more chance to successfully hack into any computer system.

fields.name: Cat Reflexes
fields.description: You move fast like a cat! You gain 5% more chance to dodge attacks.

fields.name: Lucky shoot
fields.description: I didn't mean to, but it just happened! You gain 5% more chance to do a critical hit.
